pr_title: FM2-191: Add support for estimated birthdates

timeline.bodyText: What happens if the birthdate is not estimated?
timeline.author: ibacher

replies.bodyText: it will set the birthday as usual. it will alter only if birthday is estimated.
replies.author: theanandankit

replies.bodyText: I have put all this in if else statement. it will check whether the birthday is estimated or not and according to this we will set the birthday.
replies.author: theanandankit

timeline.bodyText: Doesn't this potentially set birthdate twice?
timeline.author: ibacher

replies.bodyText: Initially it will set the birthday as usual but if the birthday is estimated then it will set the new birthday as expected.
replies.author: theanandankit

replies.bodyText: I have put all this in if else statement. it will check whether the birthday is estimated or not and according to this we will set the birthday.
replies.author: theanandankit

timeline.bodyText: Instead of using Calendar can we change this to use the java.time package classes?
timeline.author: ibacher

replies.bodyText: changed the calendar to java.time package classes.
replies.author: theanandankit

timeline.bodyText: Instead of using Calendar can we change this to use the java.time package classes?
timeline.author: ibacher

replies.bodyText: changed the calendar to java.time package classes.
replies.author: theanandankit
